
<!-- the official list of naked modeling functions and their names -->

Name | Formula
-----|---------------
exponential | $e^x$
logarithm   | $\ln(x)$
sinusoid    | $\sin(x)$
square | $x^2$
proportional | $x$
constant | $1$
reciprocal | $1/x$ or $x^{-1}$
hump     |  $\dnorm(x)$
sigmoid  |  $\pnorm(x)$
